ing: 12 (7.2 ounce) packages Original Snack FactoryÂ® Pretzel CrispsÂ®
6 tablespoons shredded chicken in BBQ sauce, warmed
2 ounces white Cheddar cheese, cut into 12 small squares

des: "All the fantastic flavors of a pulled chicken sandwich atop Snack FactoryÂ® Pretzel CrispsÂ® makes for the perfect bite-size snack."
ins: Arrange pretzels on serving platter. Top with 1/2 tablespoon heated shredded BBQ chicken, a piece of cheese, and bacon. Allow cheese to melt slightly before serving.
